    ReminderService - Class in application
    Coordinates periodic reminder operations, such as scanning for overdue loans and notifying members via email.

    Returns a borrowed book, marks it as returned, and applies fines if overdue.
    returnCD(Member, String, LocalDate) - Method in class application.CDService

    returnMedia(Loan, LocalDate) - Method in class application.LoanService
